ProcuredItem.title: ProcuredItem
ProcuredItem.description: Represents an item that has been procured by the department.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Procured Item.

name.description: The name of the procured item.

category.description: The category of the procured item (e.g., 'Electronics', 'Supplies').

quantity.description: The quantity of the item currently available.

dateOfProcurement.description: The date when the item was procured.

installationStatus.description: The installation status of the procured item.

dateOfInstallation.description: The date when the item was installed.

remarks.description: Any additional remarks or notes about the procured item.

documents.description: A list of related documents, like manuals or receipts.

name.description: The display name of the document.

link.description: A URL pointing to the document.

Requirement.title: Requirement
Requirement.description: Represents a requirement for an item, either primary or secondary.

name.description: The name of the item required.

requiredQuantity.description: The quantity of the item required.

type.description: The type of the requirement (Primary or Secondary).

remarks.description: Any additional remarks or notes about the requirement.

ClassMeeting.title: ClassMeeting
ClassMeeting.description: Represents a scheduled class or meeting.

topic.description: The topic or name of the class/meeting.

conductedBy.description: The name of the person conducting the class/meeting.

meetLink.description: The Google Meet link for the class/meeting.

Sop.title: Sop
Sop.description: Represents a Standard Operating Procedure document.

name.description: The name or title of the SOP.

driveLink.description: A Google Drive link to the SOP document.

definition.description: Stores information about procured items. Only admins can create, update, or delete documents in this collection.
